home.description: Frontend Developer, with knowledge in web development and design, I offer the best projects resulting in quality work.
about.title: About Me.
about.description: Passionate about creating Web Pages with UI/UX User Interface, I have years of experience and many clients are happy with the projects carried out.
about.skills: My Skills Are: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Git & GitHub, Bootstrap, Flutter & Figma.
services.title: Services.
services.design.title: Web Design.
services.design.description: Beautiful and elegant designs with interfaces that are intuitive, efficient and pleasant to use for the user.
services.development.title: Development.
services.development.description: Custom web development tailored to your specifications, designed to provide a flawless user experience.
services.desktop.title: Desktop App.
services.desktop.description: Design and transform website projects into desktop apps to provide a seamless user experience.
projects.title: Projects.
projects.finance.title: Finance Tracker
projects.finance.description: A web application for tracking personal finances, managing income and expenses with intuitive charts and budget insights.
projects.groq.title: Groq Assistant
projects.groq.description: An AI-powered assistant built with Groq API, providing fast and intelligent responses for various tasks and queries.
projects.cmd.title: CMD To-Do List
projects.cmd.description: A command-line interface application for managing tasks and to-do lists with efficient keyboard-driven workflow.
projects.portfolio.title: Portfolio Modern
projects.portfolio.description: A modern and sleek portfolio website showcasing creative works with elegant animations and responsive design.
projects.sisfo.title: Sisfo Sarpras
projects.sisfo.description: An information system for managing infrastructure and facilities, streamlining asset tracking and maintenance scheduling.
